notes: Brand new or nearly new modern apartment in a high-end 12-story building with upscale lobby, concierge desk, and marble-clad elevator hall. Windows have proper safety railings which is good for baby safety, and there are no visible stairs or sharp corners. The 9th floor unit has mountain views and good natural light.
